00052 //----------------------------------------------------------
00053 template < typename _T >
00054 URefArray< _T >::~URefArray()
00055 {
00057 #ifdef _DEBUG
00058         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _refs.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00059         {
00062                 B_ASSERT( _refs[ i ]->GetRef() == 1 );
00063         }
00064 #endif
00065 }

00072 //----------------------------------------------------------
00073 template < typename _T >
00074 void
00075 URefArray< _T >::CollectGarbage()
00076 {
00077         unsigned int i = _refs.GetElemCount();
00078         while ( i-- > 0 )
00079         {
00080                 if ( _refs[ i ]->GetRef() )
00081                         _refs.Erase( i );
00082         }
00083 }
00084 
00085 //----------------------------------------------------------
00086 template < typename _T >
00087 void
00088 URefArray< _T >::AddItem( URef< _T > ref )
00089 {
00091         B_ASSERT( ref != 0 );
00092         _refs.Push() = ref;
00093 }
